marklogic.body: I dont really care how much power Hague has, so far he's showed a ton, I'd rather have him hit near 300 or better with a bunch of doubles than have Jones hit 250 and hit 20 Hrs, not sure Hague will hit near .300 but if he does and he hits a few Hrs and bunch of 2b (, barring anyone else have a surprising year) hes going to be right near Cutch in the lineup. If Cutch gets some solid protection WATCH OUT! because this will be a "break out" year, He could explode! I am big on Presley in the lead Off Spot! I If hes got presley at say .298 in front of him and Tabata .277 in front of him we will score some runs, We just need that solid production for someone!
